articles.title: James Anderson: England's record wicket-taker concerned by white ball-only contracts
articles.description: James Anderson says he is "worried" about the future of Test cricket after a number of players signed white ball-only contracts.

articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
articles.title: Sourav Ganguly: Inside the mind of India's 'greatest' cricket captain
articles.description: Sourav Ganguly's memoir is not as explosive as his captaincy but has enough to satisfy fans.
